entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
